parameters.name: EncryptionType
parameters.description:
The encryption type. Valid values: 
* INTERNAL: a service key (automatically generated by the cloud service) 
* USER_KMS: a custom key (Alibaba Cloud KMS) 
> After transparent encryption is enabled for cloud disks, it cannot be disabled.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.
